name: macOS Catalina 10.15.7 Supplemental Update, macOS Catalina 10.15.7 Update

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted font may lead to arbitrary code execution. Apple is aware of reports that an exploit for this issue exists in the wild.
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges. Apple is aware of reports that an exploit for this issue exists in the wild.
advisories.description: A type confusion issue was addressed with improved state handling.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to disclose kernel memory. Apple is aware of reports that an exploit for this issue exists in the wild.
advisories.description: A memory initialization issue was addressed.
